testcase.name: Verifying Adactin login with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given Am on the Adactin page................................................passed When Am enter the "Tamilselvan1101", "Tamil@1101" and enter the login button.passed And I search the Hotel "Melbourne","Hotel Creek","Standard","1 - One","1 - One","1 - One" and select the Hotel.passed And I enter the details "Tamil","Antony","Chennai","9876567876543345","American Express","January","2021","255" and order the Hotel.passed Then I should get the order Id..............................................passed
